# Plots with ggplot2



```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)

ca_np <- read_csv(here("data", "ca_np.csv"))

ci_np <- read_excel(here("data", "ci_np.xlsx"))

ggplot2::ggplot()

gg_base<- ggplot(data=ci_np, aes(x=year, y=visitors)) 

gg_base + geom_line()

gg_base + geom_point()

gg_base + geom_col()

gg_base + geom_area()
